title: Enterprise Security & Compliance Readiness
shortDescription: Prepare your product for enterprise security requirements and compliance certifications.
description: Navigate the complex landscape of enterprise security requirements. This playbook helps PMs work with security teams to achieve SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA compliance, pass security reviews, and address enterprise procurement requirements. Essential for selling AI/automation solutions to regulated industries and large enterprises.

prompts.note: Analyze target market compliance requirements (healthcare, finance, etc.)
Conduct security risk assessment and gap analysis
Prioritize security features and compliance requirements
Document security architecture and data handling practices
Plan compliance certification timeline and milestones
Create security testing and penetration testing plan
Document security features PRD (SSO, audit logs, encryption, etc.)

prerequisites: Understanding of target customer compliance requirements
Access to security and legal teams
